summary: I had a dream related to my epilepsy the other night, and it made me think of several things, including the privilege I experience when it comes to epilepsy
title: Privilege and Epilepsy

summary: Compassionate people are my people and they are the ones who give our society any hope of greatness
title: AMA - What is Your Favorite Quality in a Person?

summary:
Alex has an excellent post about how they name their computers which is, as they mention, a very important part of setting up a new device. 
Unlike Alex, I don't choose a new name when it gets replaced - my iPhone is always called Starlord.  Which brings me to the naming scheme: Marvel characters...
title: Naming My Computers
